featured.text: Joe: Oh, no, I don’t want to interrupt you.

By contrast, men are much more likely to interrupt (about three times as often in some studies), to argue about what has been said, to ignore or respond poorly to what has been said, to introduce more new topics into the conversation, and to make more assertions.
According to some studies, how often do men interrupt as compared with women?

definition.zh_def: 打斷或中斷某人的言談或行動。
definition.en_def: To break the continuity of an action or speech.
definition.example: Please do not interrupt me while I am speaking.
